diwali.quote: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare,it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
diwali.name: d1

diwali.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.Live the life you've imagined.
diwali.name: d2

diwali.quote: There are only two ways to live your life.One is as though nothing is a miracle.The other is as if everything is a miracle.
diwali.name: d3

diwali.quote: No matter how hard the past, you can always begin again. (Buddha)
diwali.name: d4

diwali.quote: If you would take, you must first give, this is the beginning of intelligence. (Lao Tzu )
diwali.name: d5

diwali.quote: Absence makes the heart grow fonder. (Haynes Bayly)
diwali.name: d6

diwali.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be. (Abraham Lincoln)
diwali.name: d7

diwali.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars. (Og Mandino)
diwali.name: d8

diwali.quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page. (Augustinus Sanctus)
diwali.name: d9

diwali.quote: Know how to listen, and you will profit even from those who talk badly. (Plutarch )
diwali.name: d10

diwali.quote: The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be the beginning. (Ivy Baker Priest)
diwali.name: d11

diwali.quote: He who does not trust enough, Will not be trusted. (Lao Tzu )
diwali.name: d12

diwali.quote: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention. (Jim Rohn)
diwali.name: d13

diwali.quote: Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare. (Japanese Proverb)
diwali.name: d14

diwali.quote: Anything you really want, you can attain, if you really go after it. (Wayne Dyer )
diwali.name: d15
